word_freqs <- tibble( word = vocab, positive = sum_word_freqs(docs[meta$rating_text == "positive"]), negative = sum_word_freqs(docs[meta$rating_text == "negative"]) ) %>% mutate( positive_freq = positive / sum(positive), negative_freq = negative / sum(negative) ) %>% filter(positive + negative >= 5) # åŒ…å«è‡³å°‘å‡ºç° 4 æ¬¡çš„å•è¯
